title: China Dietary Supplement Testing Services Market Worth $6.38 Million By 2025 | CAGR 13.8%
description: The China dietary supplement testing services market is expected to reach USD 6.38 million by 2025, according to a new report by Grand View Research, Inc. Growing consciousness towards consumption of protein intake for maintaining the muscle mass and sustaining optimum nutritional levels among middle-aged consumers in China is expected to increase sports nutrition demand and will have a favorable impact on the industry
cleaned_text: The [China dietary supplement testing services market](https://www.grandviewresearch.com/industry-analysis/china-dietary-supplement-testing-services-market) is expected to reach USD 6.38 million by 2025, according to a new report by Grand View Research, Inc. Growing consciousness towards consumption of protein intake for maintaining the muscle mass and sustaining optimum nutritional levels among middle-aged consumers in China is expected to increase sports nutrition demand and will have a favorable impact on the industry. Rising health awareness among all age groups is expected to play a crucial role in increasing the number of gymnasiums and fitness centers. Furthermore, leading corporates including Ali-Baba, Sinopec, CNPC, and Volkswagen have increased their expenditure for the development of gymnasiums and fitness centers in their commercial offices. As a result, health & wellness segment is expected to witness an increase in application, and, therefore, promote the use of dietary supplements over the forecast period. The stability testing is expected to be the fastest growing method in testing services for dietary supplements in China over the forecast period. Growth in the stability testing services market is expected to be positively affected by increasing R&D activities, especially in China. Dietary supplements manufacturers are investing towards R&D activities to improve the shelf life of dietary supplements, which will positively influence stability testing equipment market during the forecast period. The herbal is expected to be the fastest growing ingredients in the China dietary supplements testing services market over the forecast period. The market is expected to grow on account of increasing awareness about traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) and Ayurveda. Rise in perception of people against harmful effects of modern medications is also expected to be a major driver for herbal dietary supplement in China, which in turn will result in growth of testing services market during the forecast period. Under herbal segment, fruits and vegetables based herbal dietary supplement is expected to be the fastest growing herbal ingredients in testing services for dietary supplements in China over the forecast period. Owing to increase in fortification of extracts derived from fruits and vegetables during the forecast period. Some of the fruits and vegetables which are actively used in manufacturing the herbal based dietary supplements include pineapples, mangoes, blue rubbery, strawberry, oranges, watermelons, green apples and lemons. The bark-based herbal dietary supplements are expected to grow at a decent growth rate during the forecast period. The growth in the market is attributed to surge in awareness about personal health in individuals. The testing services are expected to increase on account of emergence of new herbal dietary supplements manufacturers in China during the forecast period. Request a free sample copy or view report summary: [China Dietary Supplement Testing Services Market Report](/industry-analysis/china-dietary-supplement-testing-services-market) Microbiological testing method segment is anticipated to USD 904.8 thousand in 2017, at a CAGR of 13.5% from 2017 to 2025 Stability testing method segment is likely to reach USD 1.24 million by 2025, at a CAGR of 14.6% from 2017 to 2025 In terms of revenue, regulatory testing and compliance is expected to grow at a CAGR of 14.0% over the forecast period Vitamins ingredients segment is likely to reach USD 3.34 million by 2025, at a CAGR of 14.0% from 2017 to 2025 In terms of revenue, amino acid ingredients segment is anticipated to exceed USD 970.9 thousands by 2025 The industry is characterized by mergers & acquisitions, capital expansion, and substantial R&D investment decisions to improve the market share of manufacturers Some of the prominent companies present in the industry are NSF International, Intertek Group Plc, ALS Limited, Eurofins Scientific, SGS SA, Foodscan Analytics Limited and others.
